# Dr. Antonio Rojas Castro

I am a Digital Humanities Research Associate at the **Freie Universität Berlin** and the **University of Tübingen**. I specialize in digital editions and computational literary studies. 
My current research focuses on applying network analysis to Golden Age theater in Spain and mythological and epic poems.

You can found more information about my work at:

- ORCID: <https://orcid.org/0000-0002-8916-4997>  
- GitHub: <https://github.com/arojascastro>  
- Zotero: <https://www.zotero.org/antoniorojascastro>
